key_risks: Client concentration risk in healthcare and education sectors
Competitive pressure from major consulting firms
Economic sensitivity to reduced corporate spending during downturns
controversies: 2009 accounting scandal and subsequent SEC settlement in 2012
social_issues: Decline in employee sentiment over the past year
Work-life balance and management practices need improvement
governance_issues: Historical governance issues related to accounting scandal
Ongoing regulatory scrutiny, particularly in healthcare segment
